page.title: 02Trade
page.content: {Mr Wagg owns Boscombe post office}and was{very nice,}and when I asked him the questions he seemed quite happy answering them. {The shop is very busy {with passing trade.}People come from all walks of life. He has got food which is perishable. {Mrs Aubrey was {the lady in Newton Tony post office.} She was very nice and was fairly busy and if food goes off she either throws it away or gives it to the birds. She keeps her food fresh with freezers and fridges. {She sells {sweets, seeds, comics, crisps, ice {creams, Dairy Produce and Groceries.} We asked the children in our block if they used the village shops and they did, mainly to buy sweets. The children do most of their shopping in Salisbury.
